scripts.test: rm -rf dist && tsc tests/gitFormatter.test.ts tests/chipFormatter.test.ts src/services/gitFormatter.ts src/services/chipFormatter.ts src/types.ts --outDir dist --module es2022 --target ES2022 --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution bundler --skipLibCheck && node dist/tests/gitFormatter.test.js && node dist/tests/chipFormatter.test.js
